scenarios.name: Basic Accelerometer Stuck
scenarios.description: Accelerometer X-axis freezes at 2.5 m/s² for 20 seconds during route execution

scenarios.name: High Gyroscope Noise
scenarios.description: Inject high-level noise (σ=0.8 rad/s) to all gyroscope axes for 30 seconds

scenarios.name: Magnetometer Bias Drift
scenarios.description: Gradual bias drift in magnetometer Z-axis at 0.1 µT/s for 60 seconds

scenarios.name: Critical Packet Loss
scenarios.description: 30% packet loss affecting all IMU data for 45 seconds

scenarios.name: Accelerometer Saturation
scenarios.description: Accelerometer values saturate at ±6g for 25 seconds

scenarios.name: Gyroscope Y-Axis Failure
scenarios.description: Complete failure of gyroscope Y-axis (reads zero) for 40 seconds

scenarios.name: Periodic Magnetic Interference
scenarios.description: 5Hz periodic glitch on magnetometer X-axis with ±10µT amplitude

scenarios.name: Accelerometer Scale Error
scenarios.description: 2x scaling error on all accelerometer axes for 35 seconds

scenarios.name: Low-Level Gyroscope Bias
scenarios.description: Gradual bias drift in gyroscope Z-axis at 0.01 rad/s per second

scenarios.name: Multi-Axis Magnetometer Failure
scenarios.description: Complete failure of magnetometer X and Y axes for 30 seconds

scenarios.name: Intermittent Data Loss
scenarios.description: 15% packet loss with burst characteristics affecting system stability

scenarios.name: Temperature Drift Simulation
scenarios.description: Simulated temperature-induced bias drift on all accelerometer axes

scenarios.name: Vibration Noise Test
scenarios.description: High-frequency vibration noise on accelerometer simulating mechanical disturbance

scenarios.name: Magnetic Storm Simulation
scenarios.description: Severe magnetic interference affecting all magnetometer axes

scenarios.name: Sensor Aging Test
scenarios.description: Simulated sensor aging with reduced sensitivity (0.8x scale factor)
